content.title: Failure Reasons

content.query:
let getCallerIpAddress = (data:string) 
    { 
       let ipStr= 'ClientIpAddress","value":"'; //This is located within the additionalDetails attribute within the AuditLog
       let i =  indexof(data,ipStr);
       let j = indexof(data,'"',i+strlen(ipStr)+1);
       let k =  substring(data,i+strlen(ipStr));
       let ClientIpAddress = split(k,'"')[0];
       ClientIpAddress
    };
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "verify" 
| extend addtionalDetails = tostring(AdditionalDetails)
| where addtionalDetails contains "VerificationMethod"
| extend ad1=extractjson("$.[5].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails))
| extend ad2 = extractjson("$.[4].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails))
| where Result != "success"
| extend  Method=strcat(ad1,",",ad2)
| where Method contains("PhoneCall")
| extend x = indexof(addtionalDetails,'+')
| extend y = indexof(addtionalDetails,'"',x)
| extend Phone =  substring(addtionalDetails,x,y-x )
| extend IPAddress= tostring((getCallerIpAddress(AdditionalDetails)))
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId,Policy=extractjson("$.[1].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails)),Phone,IPAddress,Method, Result, ResultDescription, OperationName, addtionalDetails
| where ResultDescription contains("Phone number has bad reputation")
| summarize Count = count() by Phone
| order by Count
| render  table
content.title: Blocked Due To Bad Reputation
IP Address With Failed Phone Authentications

content.query:
let getCallerIpAddress = (data:string) 
    { 
       let ipStr= 'ClientIpAddress","value":"'; //This is located within the additionalDetails attribute within the AuditLog
       let i =  indexof(data,ipStr);
       let j = indexof(data,'"',i+strlen(ipStr)+1);
       let k =  substring(data,i+strlen(ipStr));
       let ClientIpAddress = split(k,'"')[0];
       ClientIpAddress
    };
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "verify" 
| extend addtionalDetails = tostring(AdditionalDetails)
| where addtionalDetails contains "VerificationMethod"
| extend ad1=extractjson("$.[5].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails))
| extend ad2 = extractjson("$.[4].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails))
| where Result != "success"
| extend  Method=strcat(ad1,",",ad2)
| where Method contains("PhoneCall")
| extend x = indexof(addtionalDetails,'+')
| extend y = indexof(addtionalDetails,'"',x)
| extend Phone =  substring(addtionalDetails,x,y-x )
| extend IPAddress= tostring((getCallerIpAddress(AdditionalDetails)))
| extend AgentDetails = parse_user_agent(extractjson("$.[3].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails)), dynamic(["browser","os","device"])) 
| extend BrowserFamily=extractjson("$.['Browser'].Family",tostring(AgentDetails))
| extend BrowserMajorVersion=extractjson("$.['Browser'].MajorVersion",tostring(AgentDetails))
| extend BrowserMinorVersion=extractjson("$.['Browser'].MinorVersion",tostring(AgentDetails))
| extend DeviceFamily=extractjson("$.['Device'].Family",tostring(AgentDetails))
| extend DeviceBrand=extractjson("$.['Device'].Brand",tostring(AgentDetails))
| extend DeviceModel=extractjson("$.['Device'].Model",tostring(AgentDetails))
| extend OSFamily=extractjson("$.['OperatingSystem'].Family",tostring(AgentDetails))
| extend OSMajorVersion=extractjson("$.['OperatingSystem'].MajorVersion",tostring(AgentDetails))
| extend OSMinorVersion=extractjson("$.['OperatingSystem'].MinorVersion",tostring(AgentDetails))
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId,Policy=extractjson("$.[1].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails)),BrowserFamily,OSFamily,Phone,IPAddress,Method, Result, ResultDescription, OperationName, addtionalDetails
| summarize Count = count() by BrowserFamily
| order by Count
| render  table

| extend BrowserFamily=extractjson("$.['Browser'].Family",tostring(AgentDetails))
| extend BrowserMajorVersion=extractjson("$.['Browser'].MajorVersion",tostring(AgentDetails))
| extend BrowserMinorVersion=extractjson("$.['Browser'].MinorVersion",tostring(AgentDetails))

| extend OSMinorVersion=extractjson("$.['OperatingSystem'].MinorVersion",tostring(AgentDetails))

| order by Count

content.title: Operating System

content.query:
let getCallerIpAddress = (data:string) 
    { 
       let ipStr= 'ClientIpAddress","value":"'; //This is located within the additionalDetails attribute within the AuditLog
       let i =  indexof(data,ipStr);
       let j = indexof(data,'"',i+strlen(ipStr)+1);
       let k =  substring(data,i+strlen(ipStr));
       let ClientIpAddress = split(k,'"')[0];
       ClientIpAddress
    };
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "verify" 
| extend addtionalDetails = tostring(AdditionalDetails)
| where addtionalDetails contains "VerificationMethod"
| extend ad1=extractjson("$.[5].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails))
| extend ad2 = extractjson("$.[4].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails))
| where Result != "success"
| extend  Method=strcat(ad1,",",ad2)
| where Method contains("PhoneCall")
| extend x = indexof(addtionalDetails,'+')
| extend y = indexof(addtionalDetails,'"',x)
| extend Phone =  substring(addtionalDetails,x,y-x )
| extend IPAddress= tostring((getCallerIpAddress(AdditionalDetails)))
| where ResultDescription contains( "Phone number has bad reputation")
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId,Policy=extractjson("$.[1].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails)),Phone,IPAddress,Method, Result, ResultDescription, OperationName, addtionalDetails
| summarize Count = count() by Phone, bin (TimeGenerated,1d)
| order by Count
| render  timechart

    {

AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "verify" 
| extend addtionalDetails = tostring(AdditionalDetails)

| extend ad2 = extractjson("$.[4].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails))
| where Result != "success"
| extend  Method=strcat(ad1,",",ad2)

| extend IPAddress= tostring((getCallerIpAddress(AdditionalDetails)))

| summarize Count = count() by Policy, bin (TimeGenerated,1d)
| order by Count
| render  timechart

let getCallerIpAddress = (data:string) 
    { 
       let ipStr= 'ClientIpAddress","value":"'; //This is located within the additionalDetails attribute within the AuditLog
       let i =  indexof(data,ipStr);
       let j = indexof(data,'"',i+strlen(ipStr)+1);
       let k =  substring(data,i+strlen(ipStr));
       let ClientIpAddress = split(k,'"')[0];
       ClientIpAddress
    };
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "verify" 
| extend addtionalDetails = tostring(AdditionalDetails)
| where addtionalDetails contains "VerificationMethod"
| extend ad1=extractjson("$.[5].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails))
| extend ad2 = extractjson("$.[4].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails))
| where Result != "success"
| extend  Method=strcat(ad1,",",ad2)
| where Method contains("PhoneCall")
| extend x = indexof(addtionalDetails,'+')
| extend y = indexof(addtionalDetails,'"',x)
| extend Phone =  substring(addtionalDetails,x,y-x )
| extend IPAddress= tostring((getCallerIpAddress(AdditionalDetails)))
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId,Policy=extractjson("$.[1].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails)),Phone,IPAddress,Method, Result, ResultDescription, OperationName, addtionalDetails
| where ResultDescription contains( "Phone number has bad reputation")
| summarize Count = count() by Phone
| order by Count desc
| render  table

AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "verify" 
| extend addtionalDetails = tostring(AdditionalDetails)
| where addtionalDetails contains "VerificationMethod"
| extend ad1=extractjson("$.[5].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails))
| extend ad2 = extractjson("$.[4].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails))
| extend Method=strcat(ad1,",",ad2)
| where Result != "success"
| where Method contains ('{PhoneNumber}')
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId, ResultDescription,Method, Policy=extractjson("$.[1].value",tostring(AdditionalDetails)), OperationName
| order by TimeGenerated desc
